meanings.definition: The study or practice of the medicinal and therapeutic use of plants.
meanings.sent1: Herbalism involves learning about how plants can help people feel better.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in the power of herbalism to treat various ailments.
meanings.sent3: The herbalism class was so interesting that even the plants seemed to be paying attention.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of herbalism, knowledge blooms like flowers of healing.
meanings.sent5: The ancient art of herbalism is like a treasure chest of natural remedies.

meanings.definition: The use of plants for their healing properties.
meanings.sent1: She turned to herbalism to find relief for her persistent headaches.
meanings.sent2: Herbalism has been practiced for centuries as a way to promote wellness.
meanings.sent3: The herbalism shop was so popular that even the trees outside wanted to join.
meanings.sent4: In the world of herbalism, plants are like nature's own medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent5: The magic of herbalism lies in the healing touch of Mother Nature.
